text: John Candler (7 October 1873 - 4 December 1942) was an English cricketer. He played seven first-class matches for Cambridge University Cricket Club between 1894 and 1895. Candler failed to score in his first nine first-class innings in six matches in 1894 and 1895. He finally scored in his seventh and final first-class match, making 8 not out.Wisden 2010, p. 1657. ==See also== * List of Cambridge University Cricket Club players ==References== ==External links== * Category:1873 births Category:1942 deaths Category:English cricketers Category:Cambridge University cricketers
title: John Candler (cricketer)
